labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The message appears to be sent on the current client, but not on any other
data.expected_result: The message can be sent regardless of the number of emotes in it
data.short_description: Message does not actually send if it contains a high amount of custom emotes
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server with custom emotes in it - Send a message with 100 custom emotes in it - Note the message appears to be sent - Login on another client - Notice the message was not sent
